about.name: Rémy Mondi
introduction: Hi there! I am Rémy, a front-end developer specializing in React, Next.js, and Typescript.
I can create websites, whether they are landing pages or showcase sites. I am also able to design interactive and high-performance web applications using React and Next.js.
Finally, I can perform web integration from Figma mockups to ensure a perfect match between the design and the final website.

description: My passion for front-end development led me towards JavaScript and its various libraries or frameworks such as React.js, Next.js, and Typescript.
On the back-end side, I mainly use CMS platforms like WordPress or Strapi, and online databases like Supabase.
I have recently started studying Symfony to be able to set up an API.
